name: Monkey Thrill - Fun Kids Tap Game FREE!
name_original: Monkey Thrill - Fun Kids Tap Game FREE!
description:
Help Maxi the Monkey collect all his bananas!

Jump from plant to plant across the forest – but be careful not to lose your footing!

Join the exciting forest adventure - tap, bounce, hop, jump - let’s get Maxi his bananas!

*Great Features Include*
- Addictive Game Play
- Awesome Graphics
- Unlock Epic Powers
- Top Achievers Board
- Many Levels
- Endless Run Mode, Just Keep Going!
